Activity: Review emails, prioritize tasks. Briefly browse healthcare policy news.
Prepare talking points for a meeting with hospital leadership regarding the value and benefits of the EHR system. Focus on improved patient outcomes, enhanced efficiency, and cost savings.
Meeting with hospital leadership. Presented talking points regarding the benefits of EHR.
Review the Quality Assurance testing results from @qatest-2 and identify areas for improvement in data accuracy and completeness.
Meet with the Data Analysts @da-1, @da-2 to review preliminary influenza trend data and identify any unexpected patterns or outliers. Discuss potential explanations for these findings.

Organize a focus group with nurses, physicians, and medical records specialists to gather feedback on the EHR system's impact on their workflow and patient care. Facilitate an open and constructive discussion.

Summarize the key findings from the focus group and share them with the EHR Vendor Liaison @ehrv-1, Clinical Lead @clinlead-1, and IT Project Manager @itpm-1. Develop an action plan to address the identified issues.
Review and approve any change requests related to the EHR system. Ensure that all changes are properly documented and tested before implementation.
Prepare a presentation for the hospital's medical staff on the progress of EHR implementation and the benefits of using the system. Highlight success stories and address any remaining concerns.
